alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo and east central Dawson Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miller, or 22 miles northwest of Kearney, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Sumner and Miller. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
